column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I woke up this morning and decided to go get my haircut .
#text=I normally go to a place that calls for a phone call in advance of arriving but this time I decided to go to a different place where I could just walk in .
#text=When I arrived I had to wait for about 10 minutes before someone could cut my hair , which was alright with me since I did not make an appointment or anything .
#text=When I got in the chair the lady cutting my hair asked me what kind of haircut I wanted and I told her short hair on the top with a buzz cut on the sides .
#text=She told me that would be a great look for me and I agreed .
#text=During the hair cut I talked to the barber about what I did in life and asked her some questions as well .
#text=After about 10 minutes she finished the job .
#text=I tipped her 5 dollars for her effort and went off satisfied with my haircut .
